sections.label: About
sections.description: Mother Earth Radio Plugin v1.5.0 - High Resolution Internet Radio with real-time metadata. Four channels (Radio, Klassik, Instrumental, Jazz) each with four quality options: FLAC 192kHz/24bit Stereo, FLAC 96kHz/24bit Stereo, FLAC 192kHz/24bit Mono, and AAC 96kHz.
